property.name: job.dictionary.path.output
property.description: Dictionary output path / Triples input path

property.description: Whether to delete dictionary output path

property.description: Whether to delete dictionary sample path

property.name: job.triples.path.output.delete
property.description: Whether to delete triples output path

property.name: job.dictionary.reducers
property.description: Number of reducers used by jobs

property.description: Number of reducers used by jobs
